locationAffected: KONA, KONZ, MCDI, UKFS, SERC, HOPB, UNDE, BART, OAES, MCRA, CUPE, GUIL, GRSM, CLBJ, PRIN, ONAQ, REDB, BLAN, MLBS, SCBI, LIRO, STEI, YELL
issue: An error was discovered in one of the formulas used to calculate BRDF corrections. The error resulted in a minor bias that was most prevalent in pixels at the edge of flightlines and in the NIR region of the spectrum. Errors generally ranged from 0.1-0.3%, which is well within documented uncertainty limits of 5%. Note that due to the selection of nadir-most pixels in the mosaic product, the most heavily influenced flightline edge pixels are less likely to be transferred to the mosaic product.

locationAffected: ABBY, ARIK, HARV, KONA, KONZ, SCBI, SRER
issue: Error in the timing signal caused errors in spectrometer geolocation for certain flightlines. Extent of each site affected is variable.
